sources.name: OrderInputData
sources.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as short,
		CustomerName as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		Product as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrderInputData

sources.name: CustomerInputData
sources.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		ContactNum as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerInputData

sinks.name: CustomerOrderOutput
sinks.script:
CustomerOrdersOuterJoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		Product,
		CustomerID,
		CustomerName = CustomerInputData@CustomerName,
		ContactNum,
		Country = CustomerInputData@Country,
		OrderDate = CustomerInputData@OrderDate
	)) ~> CustomerOrderOutput

transformations.name: CustomerOrdersOuterJoin
transformations.script:
OrderInputData, CustomerInputData join(OrderInputData@CustomerName == CustomerInputData@CustomerName,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerOrdersOuterJoin
